messages.content: Yea man for sure I'll see what I can do

Hey Justin! If it's not a bother and if possible, can you give me a recommendation to your boss at parking? I recently submitted 2 job applications to parking. one to calzada and one to puig! i hope i get a job so i can work with you and get to actually know you! if not, we can hang during winter quarter! bless you!
